Class AbstractArmor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.game.AbstractGameObject

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractGlove, ModCrown, RobeBottom, RobeTop, SpecialCrown

    public abstract class AbstractArmor
extends AbstractItem
    A piece of armor for a player

    Spencer Imbleau

                     int tileWidth,
                     int tileHeight,
                     java.lang.String iconPath,
                     int offX,
                     int offY)
        Initialize an abstract armor
        Parameters:
        name - - the name of the armor
        armorType - - the type of the armor
        damageReduction - - the amount of damage reduction
        spriteSheetPath - - the path of the sprite sheet
        tileWidth - - the width of the armor
        tileHeight - - the height of the armor
        iconPath - - the path of the icon
        offX - - the x offset to the player's position
        offY - - the y offset to the player's position
